current.order_protection_content: Hassle-free holiday shopping is here. Add on our shipping protection to protect your order from loss, theft, or damage. Just let us know if a shipping issue arises and we will replace or refund your order with no questions asked.
current.checkout_blurb_content:
30 day Satisfaction guarantee

Don’t like something? Send it back, just email help@havemersi.com and we’ll help you out.

We donate

We sponsor animal sanctuaries and provide resources such as food and veterinary care.

Responsible Manufacturing

We work with WRAP certified factories to ensure that our customers receive the highest quality products

US Business

100% of our orders are processed and shipped from our New Jersey office and warehouse.

settings.subtitle: WHY WE LOVE IT
settings.title: A No-Waste Period
settings.text: The OrganiCup can be reused for up to 10 years. That's right - TEN YEARS. Saving you from spending lots of $$$ on tampons, and the environment from absorbing pounds of waste.

settings.heading: Carry Elegance with Every Step
settings.info: At MERSI, we craft conscious affordable luxury accessories that align with your values.

settings.heading: Crafted With Purpose
settings.info: 10% Of Profits Donated To Animal Sanctuaries.

settings.comments: I am so pleased with the beautiful quality of my Demi Bucket. It's so soft and yet strong. The size is my favorite part. I am a grad student, so I no longer need a backpack to haul around 50 pounds of books. The bag is the perfect size for my Macbook Pro, a small notebook, and of course my other necessities fit nicely in the outside pockets.
settings.name: Jess B.

settings.comments: I fell in love with this bag as soon as I saw a coworker coming in with it and I just couldn't help but buy it. The green is a beautiful subtle color and the gold hardware looks so luxe! The size is perfect, and as the key closer is so interesting! Everyone always wants to try it, it's become my every day bag!
settings.name: Mariam M.

settings.comments: Super cute and structured. The details makes it look like a much more expensive bag. I just love how it makes casual jeans and t-shirts pop! I got it in yellow. I love that I got two shoulder straps that are equally fun and stylish! So many compliments!
settings.name: Angela R.

settings.right_text_2: Smooth Lock keeps your item safe
